cleaned_text: STUTTGART, GERMANY - JUNE 10: Prof. Dr. Christoph Hueck, a German molecular biologist and adherent of anthroposophy, speaks to journalists during an interview at Rudolf Steiner Haus on June 10, 2020 in Stuttgart, Germany. Hueck has become a prominent voice among those opposed to mandatory vaccinations and has spoken at mass protests in Stuttgart against government coronavirus pandemic lockdown measures, which he claims are an instrument of government control. He has also questioned the role of Bill Gates and the Bill Gates Foundation in coronavirus vaccine research. Bill Gates has become a central target of conspiracy theorists.
